de.kaiser.model.style.ParagraphStyleProperties
public class ParagraphStyleProperties extends TextBlockStyleProperties
Concrete style properties for a paragraph element.

    • mergeWith

      public void mergeWith(ElementStyleProperties base)
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: TextBlockStyleProperties
      Merges properties from a specific style into this one. All properties are set from the specific style if they are available. If they are not available this style is used
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      mergeWith in Klasse TextBlockStyleProperties
      Parameter:
      base - The specific style.

    • applyPropertiesTo

      protected void applyPropertiesTo(ElementBlockStyleProperties target)
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: TextBlockStyleProperties
      Helper method to apply all properties from this object to another. Used by the copy() method in concrete subclasses.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      applyPropertiesTo in Klasse TextBlockStyleProperties
      Parameter:
      target - The object to apply the properties to.
